item.name: Jack Daniel's Single-Barrel Tennessee Whiskey
item.remarks: It escaped the supplies promptly; A sneaky father seems to have broken his vows.

item.name: Kuma
item.remarks: A gentle reminder of childhood innocence, yet with no place here in times like these.

item.name: Flashlight
item.remarks: Amidst the destruction, the flashlight serves its valiant purpose well in recovering your essentials.

item.name: Canned Tuna
item.remarks: A classic snack enjoyed thoroughly by the father. He gingerly pries off the tin lid, and serves it to his children.

item.name: First Aid Kit
item.remarks: Your daughter is injured... You address it with this First Aid Kit.

item.name: Keys
item.remarks: You aren't going anywhere... Your car is buried in rubble.

item.name: Crowbar
item.remarks: The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.

item.name: Flare
item.remarks: The flare sparks a crimson red in the dead of the dark. You find your way around easily.

item.name: Plank
item.remarks: With one useless plank you hold comes hundreds more from the collapse of your home.

item.name: Pipe Wrench
item.remarks: Would you kindly toss that wrench back into the rubble? You're not the town plumber!

item.name: Gauze
item.remarks: Any wounds that come flying at you are stopped by a thick gauze wrapping.

item.name: Suspiciously Long Pillow
item.remarks: Shrek is love, Shrek is life.

item.name: Fire Extinguisher
item.remarks: A fire immolates the debris. You fend it off with this handy Fire Extinguisher.

item.name: Portable Radio
item.remarks: The radio keeps the family updated on all happenings through the aftermath of the quake.

item.name: Town Map
item.remarks: The map helps you navigate through the destruction of the city to the evacuation point.

item.name: Cash
item.remarks: You'll need your cash to live through these trying times.

item.name: House Documents
item.remarks: These documents are proof of your home ownership and mortgage payments.

item.name: Sleeping Bag
item.remarks: An uncomfortable but essential place to sleep in the night.

item.name: Can Opener
item.remarks: It won't be too uncommon to find canned sardines around here.

item.name: Spare Batteries
item.remarks: It's a good idea to keep your electronics charged.

item.name: My Manifesto
item.remarks: What- Why would you... Like, what is that, why would you write something like that?

item.name: Burnout Revenge for the PS2
item.remarks: There's no weed to smoke, no diet soda to fill your bellies with, no hanging out to do.

item.name: Rubber Duck
item.remarks: Useful for screaming when debugging code, less so for surviving a natural disaester.

item.name: Pocket Fan
item.remarks: The flimsy pocket fan blows 1 kt of air at your forehead.

item.name: Steak
item.remarks: There's no way to keep the steak from spoiling.

item.name: Medicine
item.remarks: Your wife has a health condition. Lucky of you to bring the medicine.
